name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, I excel in crafting high-performance software solutions utilizing **Java**, **Spring**, **React**, **Vue.js**, and **TypeScript**. My proficiency also extends to developing scalable applications in **Python**, with deep capabilities in modern frameworks such as **Django** and **FastAPI**. I am well-versed in containerization and orchestration technologies like **Kubernetes** and **Helm**, ensuring efficient deployment and management of cloud applications.

I have successfully delivered enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI/ML capabilities, integrating tools like **Apache Kafka** for real-time data processing and intelligent automation. My work adheres to industry compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring robust and secure application environments. Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in CI/CD practices and event-driven architectures, enabling streamlined workflows and enhanced collaboration across development teams. My hands-on experience in machine learning pipelines and MLOps further enriches my skill set, empowering me to effectively serve ML models in production.
